verses.verse: <S%G2532>and<s%> sent <S%G649>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> those who were <S%G2564>invited<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1062>marriage<s%> <S%G2532>feast,<s%> but they <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>

<S%G3825>Again<s%> he sent <S%G649>out<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1401>servants,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2036><s%> 'Tell those who are <S%G2564>invited,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G712>dinner.<s%> <S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G5022>cattle<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> my <S%G4619>fatlings<s%> are <S%G2380>killed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G2092>ready.<s%> <S%G1205>Come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the marriage <S%G1062>feast!<s%>"'

<S%G1161>But<s%> they made light <S%G272>of<s%> <S%G565>it,<s%> and went their ways, <S%G3588>one<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2398>his<s%> own <S%G68>farm,<s%> <S%G3588>another<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2398>his<s%> <S%G1711>merchandise,<s%>

<S%G4198>Go<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G1327>the<s%> intersections of the <S%G3598>highways,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> as <S%G3745>many<s%> <S%G302>as<s%> you may <S%G2147>find,<s%> <S%G2564>invite<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the marriage <S%G1062>feast.<s%>'

<S%G1565>Those<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3598>highways,<s%> and gathered <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G3956>as<s%> many <S%G3745>as<s%> they <S%G2147>found,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G4190>bad<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G18>good.<s%> <S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G1062>wedding<s%> was <S%G4130>filled<s%> with <S%G345>guests.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1525>when<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> came <S%G1525>in<s%> to <S%G2300>see<s%> the <S%G345>guests,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> who <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1746>have<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1062>clothing,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2083><s%> 'Friend, <S%G4459>how<s%> did you come <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2192>wearing<s%> <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1742>clothing?<s%>' He was <S%G5392>speechless.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G1249>servants,<s%> <S%G1210><s%> 'Bind <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4228>foot,<s%> <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G142>away,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1544>throw<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1857>outer<s%> <S%G4655>darkness;<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> is where the <S%G2805>weeping<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1030>grinding<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth<s%> will <S%G2071>be.<s%>'

<S%G2532>They<s%> sent <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G649>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> along <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G2265>Herodians,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G227>honest,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2532>truth,<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3199>matter<s%> <S%G3762>whom<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G4012>teach,<s%> for <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G3756>aren't<s%> <S%G991>partial<s%> <S%G4383>to<s%> <S%G444>anyone.<s%>

They <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2541>"Caesar<s%>'s." <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>he<s%> said to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G591>"Give<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar<s%> the things that are <S%G2541>Caesar<s%>'s, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> the things that are <S%G2316>God<s%>'s."
In the same <S%G3668>way,<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5154>third,<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G2033>seventh.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G3756>haven't<s%> <S%G314>you<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> that which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> to <S%G314>you<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G1473><s%> 'I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2384>Jacob?<s%>' <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> of the <S%G2198>living.<s%>"
Now <S%G1161>while<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> were gathered <S%G4863>together,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> them a <S%G846>question,<s%>

<S%G2962><s%> 'The Lord <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2962>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> sit <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> right <S%G1188>hand,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G302>I<s%> <S%G5087>make<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> a <S%G4228>footstool<s%> for your <S%G4675>feet?<s%>'

<S%G2532>No<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G611>answer<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> did <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G5111>dare<s%> <S%G1905>ask<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> any <S%G3765>more<s%> questions <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G575>forth.<s%>
